title: Senior ReactJS/React Native Software Engineer
description:
Company Description

Strategic Systems is a solutions company based in Buford, GA, focusing on
enterprise mobility, RFID, and wireless networking. We’ve channeled our
extensive RFID technology and mobility experience into creating a scalable,
flexible cloud-based platform that enables companies to track the movement of
people and items within their organization using multiple technologies,
providers, and devices.




Role Description

This is a full-time, remote or hybrid role to join our small, talented
development team. We are looking for a smart, experienced software engineer with
demonstrable experience in React Native and ReactJS, and, in general, getting
things done. You will help us maintain and expand our cloud-based application
configuration platform, and the solutions built on it.




You will be responsible for enhancing our dynamic React/ReactNative
cross-platform frontend. You will participate in architectural discussions,
perform peer code reviews, and help us keep the overall quality high while
maintaining a focus on deliverability. For a full list of our development
tenets, please see our Development Team Principles.




If this sounds attractive to you, we are looking for a bright, experienced
professional software developer to join our team. Either well experienced in
general (10+years), and some (3+years) ReactJS and similar experience, or a
ReactJS expert (5+ years in general, most of which with ReactJS/React Native).




Qualifications

 * 10+ years Software developement + 3+ years React Native / ReactJS, or
 * 5+ years React Native / ReactJS experience on demonstratable complex
   frontends
 * Strong problem-solving and analytical abilities
 * Excellent communication and teamwork skills
 * Strong proficiency in English
 * Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field
 * Previous experience in enterprise mobility or RFID technologies is a plus




More Information

We’ve been in business for more than 20 years. Our habit of hiring capable and
friendly people is part of the reason for that success. To join us, you will
need to be dedicated to your profession and excited by the work we do.




Only US-based candidates will be considered for this position, EST or CT time
zones preferred. Core hours are 9:30 am to 4:00 pm Eastern time. Our office is
in Suwanee, GA which is just north of Atlanta, but the development team works
remotely apart from occasional in-person meetings. We will not provide visa
sponsorship.
